channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Refuse chute blocked - middle block Lincoln Court estate, 3rd October
item.description:
The refuse chute in the middle block of Lincoln Court Estate, ref flats 67-132, is blocked. It has been blocked since at least Wednesday.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Bethune Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Entrance door getting stuck hill House 1/30, 3rd October
item.description:

item.title: Dead adult fox in front garden under hedge, 3rd October
item.description:
I will bag it in double bin bag and place it on top of the bin in the front garden of 28 Wattisfield Rd

item.title: Urgent - Damaged tree branch overhanging footpath, 3rd October
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Queen's Mead Road, Shortlands, London

item.title: Lampost 4, 5, 6. Outside Horse Hospital, 29 and 25, 3rd October
item.description:

item.title: Dumped mattress & other household furniture, 3rd October
item.description:
